text: Derek and Clive were a comedy character duo made up by Dudley Moore and Peter Cook. They can be seen as more offensive version of the earlier characters Pete and Dud. They used many swear words and worked as lavatory attendants. ==Albums== *Derek and Clive (Live) (1976) *Derek and Clive Come Again (1977) *Derek and Clive Ad Nauseam (1978) ==Film== *Derek and Clive Get the Horn (1979) Category:Duos Category:Television characters
title: Derek and Clive
